headline: Was Jim Cramer Right About Otis Worldwide Corporation (OTIS)?
summary: We recently published a list of Was Jim Cramer Right About These 12 Stocks? In this article, we are going to take a look at where Otis Worldwide Corporation (NYSE:OTIS) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses.
